attributes.action: Reveal the identitys of James bunglers killers and let The british people vote what happens to them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and many others are disgusted at The killers of James Bungler and believe justice should be handed to the people as we are a democracy and in a democracy the people have a right to decide

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
